metadata.title: Minification Test Data
metadata.description: Sample XML data for testing minification tools
metadata.author: Test Developer

case.name: HTML Whitespace Removal
case.description: Test removal of unnecessary whitespace in HTML files
case.expected: Reduction of at least 20% in file size

case.name: CSS Minification
case.description: Test compression of CSS files by removing comments and whitespace
case.expected: Reduction of at least 30% in file size

case.name: JavaScript Minification
case.description: Test minification of JavaScript files including variable name shortening
case.expected: Reduction of at least 40% in file size

case.name: SVG Optimization
case.description: Test optimization of SVG files by removing metadata and precision reduction
case.expected: Reduction of at least 15% in file size

conclusion.summary: Minification tools can significantly reduce file sizes for web assets
conclusion.recommendation: Implement minification as part of your build process for production deployments
conclusion.notes: Always test minified files thoroughly as aggressive minification can sometimes break functionality
